name: The World's Greatest Fisherman (Skill Card)
skill_activation: Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
skill_effect:
Once per turn, you can pay 500 LP and discard 1 WATER monster, then add 1 WATER monster from your GY to your hand, with a different name and with a Level no more than twice the discarded monster's Level.
If you do that, flip this card over.
